case.state: Huh? Lotte, who was this? I thought I told you about the game...?
Im here to inspire the world with magic!

Oh wow! So many monsters tonight. I think you'll love my performance!
Oh! I'm going to be playing a show for the fairies tonight, that's great!
Oh! Lots of other witches tonight! This'll be super fun! I bet you've never seen a show like mine!
Yay! I was told thisd be a great place to show off some magic for an interested audience!
Yay! Thisll be fun!
Ready, set, go!
Don't care.

Yay! ~cards~!
Well, that last hand was fine, but gimme ~cards~ this time!
Perfect! Just ~cards~!
Okay okay okay! I got this! ~cards~!

Gimme ~cards~!

Metamorphie how do you transform ~cards~? Oh! Right! Metamorphie papiesse!
Metamorphie how do you transform ~cards~?
...Whatever.
Its not on purpose! I swear its not on purpose! You think its on purpose, dont you?

I must be some sort of a genius to be this good at cards!
I did it! I got good cards, and Im not going to lose this hand! What if I tried Tia freyle! Annnnnnnnnnn- -oppppppe. Darn.
I can do this!
A world filled with magic is so much fun!! Im glad that I can have a hand like this!
Im not gonna start doubting my potential and hard work now! Come on! Bring it!
As long as I have my magic, I wont believe that I can lose!

Hmm what would Chariot do?
Hmmm! This is pretty good!
All right! Any requests for my next spell?
Dunno about you guys, but Id never use magic to cheat. I want to show you only good things about magic.

Of course I have more than a pair! You dont have to act like Im a bad player here, you know!?
Torurira-ra-ra! Eh, hehe. Sorry, sorry, I thought youd all be a bit more... asleep this round Im not so sure about my hand is all, so dont be mean!

Dont think Im gonna give up so easily! Ill win this! Just you watch!

Uwaaah! Okay, okay, I have a plan to get out of this! I can't tell you what! But trust me, I have a plan!
Ohhh not this hand again! So mixed

Uhhh Oh! Cool yeah yeah yeah these are fine! It's not like I've ever been totally wrong...

This sucks.
I, like, literally wanna die because of these.

This hands uh great! Probably, definitely, for sure!
AAAAAAA!
Please, please, please work!

The only time Ive had a hand this bad was when I got troll grime under my fingernails!

This is kinda embarrassing I dont really think No! You know what! Ill do it! Ill be brave and I wont take shortcuts!

Yeech. Anything but vodka. Ive had enough potatoes to last a lifetime oh! Whats this thing called a Shine Spark!? That! That!

Seriously! You were super cute with messy hair!
Ooooo-kayyy, Hanako. I definitely don't think you're a Witch of the Primal Chaos. Those burn marks are definitely just an accident. Riiiiight.

But you can't, can you, Ini? Ha! Who's the dumb one now!? It's Ini! Duh!
Talk schmalk. You lose, I win; you're a liar, I'm a genius. We allllll know how it goes.
Kyu, I think I kinda like this guy Andrew, but I think I also kinda like this girl Diana too. What am I supposed to do?
Lotte, if you aren't sure, I can change you back... but if you want to stay like that, I think it's a great look!
Hmm... besides, how would you even be bad at masturbation? Like, you only cum once?
You look a little... nervous. Why don't you try reading some of your fanfic if you lose, Lotte?
O-ho! I see what Natsukis doing! And what shes wearing! Youre pretty sneaky, Natsuki, so its lucky it makes you look even sweeter than a strawberry tart!
Hmm Just Er studying away here! Like a powerful sorceress! Yep! (Hes kinda a stereotypical hero, so I should I wish I had guidance on this, Chariot!)
Yknow, Pit, Im pretty great at cards. Er, at least some card games. Anyway, if you lose before me, how about you let me summon you to teach you how to play better?! Its a challenge!
You know, Pit, I think Ive heard of an eggplant wizard, but Im certainly seeing a different kind of eggplant right now

Hmm! Wait! Wait a second! Natsuki, you cant have ~player~ and Pit! Thats not fair! I saw them at the same time you did! Since you got greedy, Im going to seduce both of them!

Dark secrets...? Mmm... nope, I'm pretty much what you see is what you get. I'm not even good enough at magic to use the really dark stuff.
You know, I think I really do all of this for my family. They supported me no matter what, and if you think about it, friends are kinda like family, because you adopt them and they adopt you!

I don't think people should lie to each other... but... I guess life's not always that simple...

You know what! I really can do this! Phaidoari Afairynghor! You cant always get what you dream of, but you do get what you work hard for!

Sybilladura lelladybura! I may not need my broom or Shiny Balai here, but I can use what Ive learned and what only I can do to get better. Im gonna win this!
Lyonne! I know its kind of a short one, but its one of my favorites! Im thankful for the time all of us have gotten to spend here together! But now Im gonna kick your butts!
Ehehe, I guess being naked in front of other people is a way of connecting with them. Im kinda getting into this whole naked thing! Anyway, time for my spell! Phasansheer shaerylla!

I really want you all to smile! If that means I need to pick up the pace, let me know!
Hey! If any of you like my magic, my school's always recruiting! It's called Luna Nova and has a rich heritage and blah blah blah; you're here to see people get naked, right?
Luna Nova's the place where I learned all my magic! It's also where Shiny Chariot went to school, so it's amazing! Like how everyone here is from all these worlds and times and stuff.
You guys know Shiny Chariot, right? NO?! But she's the coolest! Um... she was a pioneer of stage magic, kind of like what I'm doing, but even more fantastic! Trust me! She's the best!
Shiny Chariot's pretty much the greatest stage magician ever. Buuuut I don't think she ever had the idea of performing for people who wanted to get naked.
I'm a pretty amazing witch, and I travel around putting on performances to inspire people with magic and to believe in magic. It's totally my dream job!
I had to work really hard, but I made it! I'm just trying to show everyone how amazing magic can be!
I know that some of you think that magic's not popular, and not real, but I'm here to show you all how magical our world can be!
I know, I know, you're all big fans, but let me do my intro, 'kay? I toooootally didn't forget!
My name's Akko! I've wanted to become a witch ever since I watched Shiny Chariot perform a magic show when I was little.
This? Oh! This is the "Claimh Solais," or "Rod of Seven Stars." It lets me do really cool magic! I just call it the Shiny Rod, though.
Im a pretty big deal in the magic world Kind of
You cant find it in your heart at all to let one cute, lovely witch like me to sit out the next hand, can you?!
Okay, Akko, you can do this. You got this! Arae aryrha! I cant compare myself to others. I just have to do what only I can do!
Definitely the bra first! I'm not the smartest witch, but I know how I'm supposed to take my clothes off! Unless that's changed! I dunno! Boobs first!

Yeah! I'm not gonna give up! Not now, not ever!

Oh yeah! Theyre some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Hiiiii if you two are watching this from home!
Oh yeah! Theyre some of my best friends! Lotte Jansson and Sucy Manbanvaran! Lottes here, but if youre watching us from home, Sucy, hiiiiii! ...Shes probably not though.

Well theres this boy but theres also this girl!

N-no were definitely not supposed tooooo

I caaan...
